Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory527.png'}
{3: 'Time flies as you and Bridget play games at the festival together. Before you know it, the sun is getting low.'}
{3: 'A startled voice comes from behind.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Charles', 3: 'No way! Boss! Is that really you?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She is staring at Bridget with wide eyes. A middle-aged man is holding her hand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Is that... Charles?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Charles', 3: "Boss! It's so good to see you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "It's been over a year? How are you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Charles', 3: 'Doing alright! Just here for the festival with my kid.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'And who might this be?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I am the Gray Raven Commandant, 【kuroname】.', 3: '23'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'Ah, the renowned Gray Raven Commandant!', 4: '1'}
{2: "Oh, you're too kind...", 3: '25', 4: "That's right, the one and only!", 5: '26'}
{2: 'Little Girl', 3: "You're super famous!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'Haha, you young folks sure are full of energy!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'I opened a bar not long ago. Want to swing by? Drinks are on me!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Bridget turns to look at me.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Shall we go and check it out?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sure thing.', 3: '33', 4: 'Sounds good!', 5: '33'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{3: 'Half an hour later. Residential District, Seaside Bar.'}
{3: 'Charles steps forward and swings open the door.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Charles', 3: 'Welcome to... the Seaside Bar!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Unlike the popular modern aesthetics of Babylonia, Charles' shop sports a rustic decor with wood-pattern finishes, making it look like an old Western pub."}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'What do you think?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'I put in quite a bit of effort to get this style to work.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'Please, make yourselves at home.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget pulls out a barstool and settles at the counter.'}
{3: 'The Seaside Bar is unusually tranquil during sundown when the staff are getting ready to open for the night.'}
{3: 'Soft, mellow jazz music fills the store. Jazz is one of the most treasured cultural legacies from before the Golden Age.'}
{3: 'In the corner sits a young couple with two bottles of juice on their table. They look like students from the Education District.'}
{3: 'Across the store sits a middle-aged worker. He looks fresh off his shift. On his table is beer... and... a rice bowl with stir-fry on top?!'}
{3: 'The man raises his glass with a warm smile when he notices your gaze.'}
{3: 'You return his gesture and turn to watch Charles mixing drinks behind the bar.'}
{3: "You find yourself thinking about today's events."}
{2: 'Peace is really...', 3: '55'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Peace is really wonderful.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The two of you say exactly the same things.'}
{3: 'After a brief moment of surprise, they share a knowing laugh.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Haha, hahaha...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Her laughter fades, and a complicated expression crosses Bridget's face."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Yes... Peace really is wonderful...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Tell me, 【kuroname】, do you think people in the past did the things we did today?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Do they go shopping, hang out with friends on weekends and holidays, and find a bench to sit on when they are tired...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Enjoy some drinks as they watch the sunset—a real sunset?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I would think so.', 3: '70', 4: 'They probably had to work overtime on weekends, too.', 5: '70'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Charles', 3: 'Here you are. One signature "Sunset Tequila" flavored electrolyte drink, and a blackcurrant sparkling water for the commandant.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'The sparkling water is non-alcoholic. Please enjoy.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Nice! Thanks, Charles!', 4: '1'}
{2: "By the way, I've been wondering...", 3: '77'}
{2: 'Charles, does this bar still serve rice bowls?', 3: '78'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: "Oh, you're talking about old John over there?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: "He got his rice bowl from Ms. Zhang's place next door. Let me tell you, her rice bowls are incredible!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'Would you like me to order a takeout for you?', 4: '2'}
{2: "Yes, I'll have the Mapo Tofu Rice Bowl, thank you!", 3: '82', 4: 'No, never mind.', 5: '82'}
{3: 'The door chimes as guests with bright smiles on their faces begin pouring in from the Education District. The bar gradually comes alive with life.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory748.jpg'}
{3: "After a few drinks and lots of chatter, the dome's simulated dusk on the artificial sky fades to black."}
{3: "The bar's amber lights cast a warm glow as the buzz of conversation mingles with the rich aroma of spirits. The tipsy atmosphere discreetly lifts everyone's mood."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'I mean, you get it, right? I was sooo mad!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'My team and I spent the whole day putting the boxes in order, and then this car just came crashing through, knocking everything over!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "They should revoke that guy's driver's license and make him recite ALL the traffic rules backward AND write them out ten times before they're allowed to drive again!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "If I were driving, I'd do a perfect job!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After having five glasses of electrolyte, Bridget becomes much more laid-back and talkative.'}
{2: 'Well, not everyone is as good at driving as you are.', 3: '96'}
{3: "You finally got a glimpse of Bridget's legendary driving skills today."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hahaha, that's true!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A few drinks in and you naturally start venting about work... It looks like a scene from a soap opera of the Golden Age.'}
{3: 'Bridget puts down her glass and leans in closer.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Hey, 【kuroname】, you must have dealt with annoying things like this, too, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Not yet at this point.', 3: '105', 4: 'Indeed, there is.', 5: '108'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'What? Really?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'You nod.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "No way, you're either super lucky... or you are so forgiving that you just let it go?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'See? I knew it! Work can really be a pain sometimes.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Bridget puts her hand on your shoulder with bright, glowing eyes, as if she's found her comrade-in-arms."}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "If you ever need to vent about work, don't keep it bottled up inside. Hit me up anytime.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Charles, another!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hey, take it easy.', 3: '113', 4: "Come on! Tonight, we're gonna drink till we drop!", 5: '114'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "It's fine!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Charles', 3: "You haven't changed a bit. I still remember that day at Support Force when you drank seven people under the table all by yourself.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'You have known each other for a long time?', 3: '118'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Yeah, Charles used to be in Support Force.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'For about eleven years now. I spent ten years in Support Force.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'He slides another glass of crystal-clear, golden beer-flavored electrolyte across the counter.'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: "It's been over a year since I retired.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He taps his right leg, producing a metallic clang.'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: "Lost a leg, and I'm not a Construct, so my body's started to slow down after all these years.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'So I decided to just retire, and also...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'He looks at the little girl playing nearby.'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'I found someone to spend the rest of my life with, and we adopted Lei.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: 'It was time to settle into a quiet, peaceful life.', 4: '2'}
{2: "Hey, I'm so happy for you!", 3: '132'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'You lucky dog, good for you!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Charles', 3: "Hahaha, right? Look at this hat my wife got me the other day. Cute, isn't it...", 4: '2'}
{2: "Are you sure she didn't get it for Lei?", 3: '137'}
{3: 'Laughter rings through the tavern. On this night of celebration, the party has just started.'}
